title: Beautiful Nightmare
description: The beautiful boy I once loved has become my darkest nightmare.I’ve spent the last two years healing.And yet, I can’t escape him.He’s here; I can’t fathom how.He’s in my thoughts and in my dreams.He’s everywhere.And he insists I pay for what I’ve done.The Royals of Shadow River University are elite members of society. Debauchery, secrets, and plot twists abound. This is book 1 of a 3 book series—each book focuses on a different couple.Shadow River Elite is a bully romance series set in the same world as Rosehaven Academy.
author: Leila James
